newsitem.title: USA: PanAmSat in service pact with Amoco.
newsitem.headline: PanAmSat in service pact with Amoco.

text.p: PanAmSat Corp said on Monday it has entered into a global service agreement with Amoco Corp that allows Amoco's regional offices and units worldwide to obtain capacity on any PanAmSat satellite through a prearranged ordering procedure.

The company said the first contract under the agreement will provide Amoco with service on PanAmSat's PAS-3 Atlantic Ocean Region satellite for a data communication link between Amoco offices in Bogota, Colombia, and Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The contract provides a framework for future service requests while offering flexibility for Amoco's needs, the company said.
